sentences.en: From the cellar grating floated up the flabby gush of porter.
sentences.cn: 隔着地窖的格子窗飘出走了气的黑啤酒味儿.

sentences.en: I drew a cheque and handed it to the cashier through the grating.
sentences.cn: 我开了一张支票,从窗栅里把它递给出纳员.

sentences.en: In order to get a narrow angular spread, we need to use the whole grating.
sentences.cn: 为了得到较窄的角展度, 我们必须利用整个光栅.

sentences.en: Leaves clogged the grating over the drain.
sentences.cn: 树叶把排水管上的格栅堵住了。

sentences.en: She recognized the grating voice of Dr. Sarnoff.
sentences.cn: 她听出了萨尔诺夫博士刺耳的嗓音。

sentences.en: The coin fell through a grating at the side of the road.
sentences.cn: 那个钱币掉进了路旁阴沟的铁格栅下面了.

sentences.en: The cook is grating a carrot.
sentences.cn: 厨师正在把胡萝卜磨成细丝.

sentences.en: The grating are made of rods or wire.
The grating protected a window in the men's room.
sentences.cn: 格栅护着男厕所的一扇窗子.

sentences.en: The grating spectrograph is built in two designs.
sentences.cn: 光栅摄谱仪有两种类型.

sentences.en: The index of plastic stereo grating blade high, with good gloss.
sentences.cn: 不软塑不不不平面平栅片折射率矮, 具有精良的平华.

sentences.en: The property of peak wavelength of slanted reflection hologram grating was discussed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了倾斜条纹反射全息光栅的波长特性.

sentences.en: The rainwater ran along the gutter into a grating at the side of the road.
sentences.cn: 雨水沿着排水沟流入了路边的阴沟格栅.

sentences.en: The rattle and bang of the frying - pan was grating horribly on my nerves.
sentences.cn: 平底锅乒乒乓乓的声音还在可怕地噬啮着我的神经.

sentences.en: When he was angry he gritted his teeth with a terrifying, grating sound.
sentences.cn: 他一生气就咬紧牙关,把牙齿磨得可怕地吱吱作响.

sentences.en: Yevlenko was standing with both hands on the desk, grating out sarcastic words.
sentences.cn: 叶甫连柯站在那里,双手放在桌面上, 粗声粗气地讲了这些挖苦人的话.

words.tran_cn: 摩擦器；磨光机；[木] 粗齿木锉
格子线；显微镜的计数线；方格图
[光]光栅；摩擦，摩擦声；[建][数]格子

phrases.tran_cn: 光栅常量；晶格恒量；点阵常数
光栅光谱仪，光栅分光计

trans.tran_en: a grating sound is hard and unpleasant
a metal frame with bars across it, used to cover a window or hole

trans.tran_cn: 磨碎，压碎( grate的现在分词 )，发出刺耳的摩擦声，使人烦恼难受
